1593724956_18FmpbxghV4UBgrjHpwgU1igoAt2g.body: For a password manager, you can try KeyPassXC. It's an open-source software, so it's totally free and is being updated somewhat frequently. As for a VPN, it's really recommended to get a paid one. There's a website which reviews them : https://thatoneprivacysite.net/#simple-vpn-comparison check it out.
